    Black Aracnia slams her foot down. "Alright! Injector, Manterror, 
Bumblebee, Double Punch, Mosquitor, Atma, Pursedo, Venomous, Solo, Grappler, 
Aerostreak, Guantix, Paralysis, Tarantulas, and the three Maximals in the 
brig....were moving out! Pack your bags NOW! Im calling Megatron. Rampage can 
have this ship and defend it himself." She roared in rage as she collected 
her things and the disks Hell Beast left behinde.
    Walking over to the Comm, she contacted Quicksrike and Darkmouse and told 
them to rendevous at the Predacon cave.

    Megatron listened to Black Aracnia, shrugged his shoulders, and agreed to 
house her. After all he didnt mind haveing some more troops around.
